description:
This portal gun can be used to teleport animals and farmbots. It can also be placed on any moving vehicle.

Be sure to leave a like and add the mod to your favorites to support our work!
[img]https://steamusercontent-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/2422250057103161085/A682E0A36F63D71A8E643AA7ACC710E907F8937C/[/img]
name: Portal Gun
